name: Kizuna-MD
description: A bot made by Savage to make your app amazingðŸ˜œ

PREFIX.description: a switch to make the bot start. You can use these: . , ! ?

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: this allows bot to read messages that you receive. You can either choose yes or no

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: this allows bot to view statuses, yes or no?

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: after bot views status, it automatically saves it. Yes or no?

PM_PERMIT.description: this restricts people from using bot in inbox without your permission. Yes or no?

BOT_NAME.description: You write the name of your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: Write a link to the menu of bot

PUBLIC_MODE.description: If you want your bot to be used by everyone, write it.Yes| If you want to do it yourself, write it down.No| No one will be able to use your bot

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Write the API for your Heroku accounts

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Copy the name that you have written in Opar 1st and paste it here.

SESSION_ID.description: The session ID of the bot which you got on WhatsApp should be written here.

OWNER_NUMBER.desc: Write down your number without the +

WARN_COUNT.desc: How many warnings do you want to give to someone, then as soon as this warning is over, that person will be blocked or if he is in the group then it will be removed.

CHAT_BOT.desc: If you mention your MSG and write something, then the reply will come for that.Yes| Write if you want to not reply.No| Write

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Bot's connected MSG comes in your inbox if you want this message to come.Yes| Write if you want MSG not to come.No| Write

PRESENCE.description: your presence on WhatsApp. Available or not?
